name: Lux Ski Jump
description: Ski jumping arcade game with hill creator, online multiplayer, flight style editor, advanced physics and many more. It has 27 in-built hills from HS25 to HS300 and many more created by users. Available single player modes: 5-Hills-Tournament, season, LSJ Cup, World Cup (online multiplayer) duel (online multiplayer), training, weekly challenge, hill creator and online users hills.
